subject: Marketing
title: Power Words
description: A micro-lesson that makes Power Words usable.

hook.text: 'Free' is the most powerful word in marketing. 'New' is second. 'You' is third.

buildup.text: Power words trigger emotional responses that bypass rational evaluation.

discovery.text: Words like 'secret,' 'proven,' 'instant,' and 'guaranteed' activate urgency and desire.

climax.text: Strategic placement of one or two power words outperforms stuffing every sentence with them.
